column4: Hey, I want to know how should partitions looks like if i want to install ubuntu. Anyone know?
there's lots of different ways to set up your partitions. It just depends. Mine is very simple. I have 3 partitions (2 for OS, 1 for swap)
are you just running one OS on that HDD?

I would keep it simple and create 2 partitions. One for ubuntu and one for swap. the swap should be equal or greater to your RAM but as you can see there are several ways to set up your partitions. The would be a very simple way.
